Html:
How to show shell in xbap application. following code i got from composite application guidance
protected override DependencyObject CreateShell()
{
shell shell = Container.Resolve<shell>();
shell.Show();
return shell;
}
above code for windows application. but i wants to show in xbap application.
if i follow the same way, it raising error called "does not contain a definition for show.
Show() method not available in xbap application.

please any one help me how to show shell in xbap application


Regards,
J.Alexander.
